Uses of Class
paint.PaintCanvas

    • Uses of PaintCanvas in paint

      Methods in paint with parameters of type PaintCanvas 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void Read.read​(PaintCanvas canvas, java.io.File file)
      Given a PaintCanvas and File, the function will read the contents of the given File path and output instructions to the given PaintCanvas
      static void Write.write​(PaintCanvas canvas, java.io.File file)
      Given a PaintCanvas and File a .vec file will be made with instructions from the given PaintCanvas and output to given File path
      Constructors in paint with parameters of type PaintCanvas 
      Constructor Description
      FillColourPicker​(PaintCanvas canvas, UndoHistoryListView<java.lang.String> undoStack)
      Given a canvas and list view object it creates a colour picker which when changed updates the canvas and list view accordingly.
      PaintButton​(ShapeType shapeType, PaintCanvas canvas)
      Given a ShapeType enum and canvas object it creates a button which the user will click on to choose the current shape type they want to draw on the canvas.
      PenColourPicker​(PaintCanvas canvas, UndoHistoryListView<java.lang.String> undoStack)
      Given a canvas and list view object it creates a colour picker which when changed updates the canvas and list view accordingly.
      RedoButton​(PaintCanvas canvas)
      Given a canvas object the redo button makes the canvas redo an action when clicked.
      UndoButton​(PaintCanvas canvas)
      Given a canvas object the undo button is created with a click event which causes the canvas to run its undoAction method.
      ViewActionsButton​(PaintCanvas canvas, PaintCanvas tempCanvas, UndoHistoryListView<java.lang.String> undo_stack)
      Given the master canvas, temporary canvas and undo history list view GUI components, the view actions buttons looks at the current item selected in the undo history list and renders the master canvas' actions up to that point on a temporary canvas.
